40000601.English_Text:
(Let's do our best
Let's have a great match!)
40000601.Chinese_Text:
(拼尽全力 
 来一场精彩的比赛吧!)

40000606.English_Text: Here, you can check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</> equipped!
40000606.Chinese_Text: 在这里可以确认装备的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>灵魂</>!

40000607.English_Text: If you click here again, Nyaa~~

40000609.Original_Text: 아, 잠깐만! 우리가 벌써\n달성한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>업적</>이 있다는 거\n알고 있었어?
40000609.English_Text: Oh, wait! Did you know we have already achieved <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>achievements</>?
40000609.Chinese_Text:
等一下!你知道
我们已经有<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>成就</>了吗?

40000610.Original_Text: 네가 이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여정</>을 통해 이룬 것들은\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>업적</>에서 확인할 수 있어!
40000610.English_Text:
What you've accomplished on this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journey</> can be found in
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Achievements</> there is!
40000610.Chinese_Text:
您在此<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>旅程</>中取得的成就可以在
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>成就</>中查看!

40000611.Original_Text: 우리가 함께한 첫 업적이야!\n참, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>보상</>도 잊지 말고 챙기라구!
40000611.English_Text:
It's our first achievement together!
Oh, don't forget the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</>!
40000611.Chinese_Text:
这是我们一起的第一个成就!别忘了拿
真<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>奖励</>哦!

40000612.Chinese_Text:
随着<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>旅程</>的进展,经常检查
成就<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>成就</>~!

40000613.Original_Text: 뭐? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여정</>이란 거 어떤 거냐고?\n좋아, 이 참에 같이 설명해 줄게!
40000613.English_Text:
What? What is <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journey</>?
Okay, I'll explain it to you right now!
40000613.Chinese_Text:
什么? <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 行程</>是什么?
 好,我一起解释!

40000614.English_Text:
Our journey is 
recorded right here.
40000614.Chinese_Text: 我们的旅程就记录在这里.

40000615.Original_Text: 진행 중이거나, 수행할 수 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들을 확인하거나
40000615.English_Text: check <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>missions</> that are in progress or that can be performed
40000615.Chinese_Text: 检查 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 正在进行或可以执行的任务,或

40000616.Original_Text: 그 임무의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>목표</>를 볼 수 있어.\n이봐, 내 말 듣고 있지?
40000616.English_Text:
You can see the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>objective</> of the mission.
Hey, are you listening to me?
40000616.Chinese_Text:
你可以看到任务的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>目标</> 
嘿,你在听我说话吗?

40000617.Original_Text: 좋아. 설명은\n이 정도면 될 것 같네.\n그럼 이따 보자!
40000617.English_Text:
Okay. I think this explanation is enough.
See you later!
40000617.Chinese_Text:
伟大的. 
 我觉得这样解释就够了. 
 见!

40000618.Original_Text: 자, 본냥과 함께\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소울</> 구매가 가능한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>상점</>을 함께 둘러보자냥~!
40000618.English_Text:
Now, with Bonnyang, look around the shop where you can purchase
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Let's see~!</>
40000618.Chinese_Text:
现在就和Bonnyang一起来看看
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>,在那里可以一起购买
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Shop</>!

40000619.English_Text:
Here, here and there!!
Check it out now!
40000619.Chinese_Text:
在这里,这里和那里!! 
 马上去看看!

40000621.Original_Text: 흐음, 지금 어울릴만한 게...\n이게 좋겠다냥!\n한번 꾹! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>눌러</>보라냥.
40000621.English_Text:
Hmm, something suitable for now...
I like this one!
Hold it once! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</>Look.
40000621.Chinese_Text:
嗯,现在适合我的东西...... 
我喜欢这个!
等等! <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 按</>查看.

40000622.Original_Text: 잠깐, 잠깐, 잠깐이다냥!\n사기 전에 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>자세히</> 한번 살펴보라냥!
40000622.English_Text:
Wait, wait, wait!
Before you buy, take a look at <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Details</>!
40000622.Chinese_Text:
等、等、等! 
购买前 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>详情</> 看一看!

40000623.English_Text:
Caution <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>To the end</>
You must read carefully!
40000623.Chinese_Text:
请仔细阅读注意事项<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>到最后</>
!

40000624.Original_Text: 자~ 다 읽었으면 이제\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소울</>을 만나러 가자냥!
40000624.English_Text:
Now, if you've read it all, let's go meet 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</>!
40000624.Chinese_Text:
现在,如果您已经阅读了所有内容,那么让我们去见
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>灵魂</>!

40000625.English_Text:
Now, finally, click <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Buy</>
Let's meet the cool soul~!
40000625.Chinese_Text:
现在终于可以点击<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>购买</>遇见
Cool Soul~!

40000626.English_Text: Let's check what the summoned <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Soul</> is!

40000628.Original_Text: 바로 요기! 요 아래에서,\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소울</>들을 확인할 수 있다냥!
40000628.English_Text:
Right Yogi! Below you can see
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Souls</>!
40000628.Chinese_Text:
正是瑜珈!下面,你可以检查
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>灵魂</>!

40000629.English_Text:
I'll tell you more clearly!
Open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Map</>~
40000629.Chinese_Text:
让我说的更清楚一点!
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>打开地图</>.

40000630.Original_Text: 모험을 통해 지역 곳곳에 있는\n다양한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>발견</>을 할 수 있다냥!\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>모험가 등급</>도 오르지냥!
40000630.English_Text:
Through adventure, you can find
various <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>discover</> all over the area!
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Adventurer Rating</> will also go up!
40000630.Chinese_Text:
通过冒险,你可以在整个地区做
各种<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>发现</>!
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>冒险者等级</>也上升!

40000631.Chinese_Text: 你能在这里看到<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>水月广场</>吗?

40000632.Original_Text: 여기를 누르면 선택한 곳으로,\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>축지</>를 해서 이동할 수 있다냥!
40000632.English_Text:
If you click here, you can move to the selected place by 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Chokji</>!
40000632.Chinese_Text:
如果点击这里,您可以通过做
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Teleport </> 移动到选定的地方!

40000634.Original_Text: 방금 받은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수호령 소환서</>를 써보자냥!\n자, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소지품</>을 열어 보라냥~
40000634.English_Text:
Let's use the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Summary of Guardian Spirit</> you just received!
Now, open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Your belongings</> Look~
40000634.Chinese_Text: 使用刚刚收到的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>守护灵召唤卷轴</>吧!

40000636.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소환서</>를 눌러\n사용해 보자냥~\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>두 번</> 눌러야 한다냥! 두 번!
40000636.English_Text:
You have to press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Summon Scroll</> to
try it~
You have to press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>twice</>! twice!

40000637.Original_Text: 자, 잠깐냥!\n방금 획득한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수호령</>을\n확인해 봐야 하지 않겠냥?
40000637.English_Text:
Come on, wait!
Why don't you check the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Guard Spirit</> you just obtained
?
40000637.Chinese_Text:
现在,等一下!
我们不应该检查一下
我们刚刚获得的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>守护灵</>吗?

40000638.English_Text:
To meet <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Guard Spirit</>
Here! Remember this place.
40000638.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>在这里遇见守护神</>
!记住这里.

40000640.Chinese_Text:
点击这里可以
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>召唤</>或<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>取消</>守护灵!

40000641.Original_Text: 이봐, 자네! 제대로 보고 있는 거야?!
40000641.English_Text: Hey, hey! Are you looking right?!

40000643.English_Text: Yeah, I have loads of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>requests</> here!

40000644.Original_Text: 의뢰를 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수락</>하면 \n바로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>를 할 수 있지.\n정말 쉽고 간단하지 않나?
40000644.English_Text:
If you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>accept</> the request, you can 
do the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>mission</> right away.
It's really easy Isn't it simple?
40000644.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>接受任务,就可以
立即完成<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>任务</>.
真的很简单,不是吗?

40000645.Original_Text: (일단 준비를 좀 해야겠어.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>귀환의 돌</>을 사용해서\n마을에 들러볼까?)
40000645.English_Text:
(First, I need to make some preparations.
Should I use <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</> to visit the village?)
40000645.Chinese_Text:
(首先,我需要做一些准备.我可以使用
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 还石</> 访问
 村庄吗?)

40000647.English_Text:
(Okay, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>I found the Return Stone</>!
Let's choose)
40000647.Chinese_Text:
(好的,<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我找到了回归石</>!
让我们选择)

40000648.English_Text:
If you use (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Return Stone</>,
here, it will go to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>God's Counter Shot</> I will)
40000648.Chinese_Text:
(如果使用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>返回石</>,它会移动到
这里<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>新大房群打</>)

40000649.Original_Text: 그래도 꽉 차면 어떻게 하냐구요?\n자, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>소지품</>을 열어보시면요~
40000649.English_Text:
But what if it's full?
Now, if you open <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Your belongings</>~

40000650.Original_Text: 여기 이렇게 소지품 공간을\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>확장</>할 수 있거든요!
40000650.English_Text:
Here you can
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>expand</>expand your inventory space like this!
40000650.Chinese_Text:
在这里你可以
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>扩展</>你的财物就这样!

40000651.Original_Text: 아쉽지만 공짜는 아니예요!\n어느 정도는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>금화</>로 확장 할 수 있죠.
40000651.English_Text:
Unfortunately, it's not free!
It can be expanded to some extent with <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gold Coins</>.
40000651.Chinese_Text:
很可惜,但不是免费的!
一定程度上可以用<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>金币</>进行扩充.

40000652.English_Text:
Or <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>logistics manager</>
It might be a way to
entrust it.
Try it once.
40000652.Chinese_Text:
或者,<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>将
委托给物流经理</>也可以是另一种方式. 
尝试使用一次.

40000653.Original_Text: 잠깐, 가기 전에\n하나 알려줄 게 있어.
40000653.English_Text:
Wait, before I go,
I have something to tell you.
40000653.Chinese_Text: 等等,在我走之前,我有件事要告诉你.

40000655.Original_Text: 획득한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>장비</>를\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>장비도감</>에 등록하면\n이로운 효과를 얻을 수 있어.
40000655.English_Text:
If you register the acquired <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Equipment</> in
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Equipment Encyclopedia</>,
You will get a beneficial effect. can.
40000655.Chinese_Text:
将获得的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>设备</>登记在
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>设备百科</>中,即可获得
效益.

40000656.Original_Text: 장비는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>상점</>이나\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거래소</>에서도 살 수 있어!\n잊지 말고 기억해 둬!
40000656.English_Text:
Equipment can also be bought at <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Store</> or
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Exchange</>!
Don't forget to remember Leave it!
40000656.Chinese_Text:
也可以从<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>商店</>或
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>兑换</>购买装备!
别忘了记得哦!

40000658.Original_Text: 저와 같은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>물류관리인</>을 만나시면\n이렇게 말을 걸어 보세요.
40000658.English_Text:
If you meet <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Logistics Manager</> like me,
Tell me something like this.
40000658.Chinese_Text:
如果你遇到像我这样的<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>物流经理</>,像这样
和他说话.

40000659.English_Text:
Your precious <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> will be safely stored 
 in <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Drawings</>.
40000659.Chinese_Text:
我们会安全地
将贵重的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>物品</>存放在
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>画展</>中.

40000660.Original_Text: 맡기신 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>물품</>은 언제든 \n되찾아 가실 수 있으니,\n안심하고 맡겨주세요.
40000660.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>项目</>可以随时归还给
,所以请放心.

40000661.Original_Text: 저와 같은 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>상인</>을 만나시면\n이렇게 말을 걸어 보십시오.
40000661.English_Text:
If you meet a <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>merchant</> like me,
Speak to me like this.
40000661.Chinese_Text:
如果你遇到<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>像我这样的商人</>,试着像这样
和他说话.

40000662.Original_Text: 그럼 이렇게\n상인들이 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>판매</>하는 품목을\n한눈에 보실 수 있습니다.
40000662.English_Text:
Then you can see
the items that merchants are selling at a glance
this way.
40000662.Chinese_Text:
然后就可以一目了然地看到

商家<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>出售</>的商品.

40000663.Original_Text: (다 둘러본 것 같다.\n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>아랑</>이 있는 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>드러난 유적지</>로 이동하자)
40000663.English_Text:
(I think I've looked around.
Let's go to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Arang</> <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>The revealed ruins</> )
40000663.Chinese_Text: (我想我已经环顾四周了.我们去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]> 裸露的废墟</> <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> Arang </> 所在的地方)

40000664.English_Text: Like this, <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hunting Ground</> can also be seen on the map.
40000664.Chinese_Text: 这样也可以在地图上看到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>狩猎场</>.

40000665.English_Text: Do you by any chance know about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword Guild</>?
40000665.Chinese_Text: 顺便问一下,你知道第三把剑</>吗?

40000666.English_Text: I'll give you this, just open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Inventory window</>.
40000666.Chinese_Text:
我给你这个,请打开
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>库存</>.

40000667.Original_Text: 참, 저희는 상점도 운영 중입니다. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>무공서 상인</>과 대화해보세요.
40000667.English_Text: Yes, we also have a shop. Talk to <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Unofficial Vendor</>.
40000667.Chinese_Text: 是的,我们也有一家商店在经营. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]> 与非政府商人 </> 交谈.

40000668.English_Text:
Hurry up and drink it!
You will feel the increase in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Aggression</>!

40000673.English_Text:
With the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>integer</> that I just gave you,
you can <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>amplify</> of the selected weapon.
40000673.Chinese_Text:
用我刚刚给你的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>精华</>,你可以<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>增强</>所选的武学
.

40000674.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>注入放大</>精华,尽量增加
木工<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>放大</>.

40000677.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>노이</>의 비옥을 통해서\n얻은 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>기억</>들 말이야.\n어디에 보이는지 알고 있어?
40000677.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>The <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memories</> obtained through the fertility of Neuy.
You know where you look. there is?
40000677.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>通过Noi</>的生育能力,
获得<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>记忆</>.你知道
在哪里吗?

40000678.Original_Text: 바로 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>사가</>야.\n이미 찾은 기억들은 물론\n찾아야 할 것들도 모여 있어.
40000678.English_Text:
That's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Saga</>.
Not only the memories I've already found, but also the things I need to find.
40000678.Chinese_Text:
是<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>佐贺</>.
不仅是我已经找到的记忆,还有我需要找到的
.

40000679.English_Text:
See? So many <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memories</>?
Now, shall we pick one?
40000679.Chinese_Text:
看?这么多<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>回忆</>?
嗯,我们选一个吧?

40000680.English_Text:
I'm going to get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Tomo</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>memory fragment</> and go
to visit them one by one!
40000680.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>从Tomo</>处获得
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>记忆碎片</>,然后
去一一拜访!

40000681.English_Text: You still don't know the true value of the small cooperative?
40000681.Chinese_Text: 还不知道小合作社的真正价值?

40000682.English_Text:
Then I should introduce <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ranking</>~!
I should introduce you!
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Ranking</> Shall we open it?
40000682.Chinese_Text:
那么,给大家介绍一下<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>排位</>吧!
要不要开<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>排位</>?

40000683.English_Text:
Can you see it?
Do you have <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Experience ranking</>?
40000683.Chinese_Text:
你能看出来吗?
小议会<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>经验排名</>?

40000684.Original_Text: 그리고 여기에서는 무림강자들의 \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>순위</>와 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>혜택</>을 볼 수 있죠.
40000684.English_Text:
And here you can see 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ranking</> and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>benefits</> of the Moorim strong.
40000684.Chinese_Text:
而在这里,你可以看到强者的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>排名</>和<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>利益</>.

40000685.Original_Text: 이런 강자들과 여정을\n함께하면 든든하겠죠?\n그럴 줄 알고 제가…
40000685.English_Text:
It would be reassuring to go on a journey with these strong people
with you, wouldn't it?
I knew it would be so...
40000685.Chinese_Text:
和这些强壮的人一起旅行会很安心
对吧?
我就知道会这样……

40000686.English_Text:
I'd like to introduce 
to Sohyeop about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Guild</>~
40000686.Chinese_Text:
我想把
介绍给Sohyeop <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>关于氏族</>.

40000687.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>문파</>에 대해 들어보신 적 있나요?\n여기서 확인하실 수 있어요.
40000687.English_Text:
Have you ever heard of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Guild</>?
You can check it out here.
40000687.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>听说过门巴</>吗?
可以在这里查看.

40000688.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>문파</>를 통해 뜻이 같은 자들과\n함께 성장해 나가는 것도 \n좋은 경험이 될 거예요~
40000688.English_Text:
It will be a good experience to grow up together with like-minded people
through <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Guild</>.
40000688.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 通过氏族与志同道合的人一起成长 </> 
 会是很好的体验~

40000691.Chinese_Text:
可以在这里制作
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]></>的装备.

40000692.English_Text:
It's my first time, so it's better to start making
from <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Accessories</>.
40000692.Chinese_Text:
这是我的第一次,所以最好尝试从<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>饰品</>制作
.

40000693.English_Text:
For now, I think this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>ornament</> would be 
perfect for making and wearing 

.
40000693.Chinese_Text:
现在,我觉得这个<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>配饰</>适合
制作和佩戴.

40000694.English_Text: If you're ready, let's <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>make</> the first trinket for the small consultation.
40000694.Chinese_Text:
准备好后,让我们做小派对的
第一个配饰<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>工艺</>.

40000695.English_Text:
Don't be impatient, wait a little
and <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Production</> will be completed.
40000695.Chinese_Text:
别急,稍等
和<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>制作</>就完成了.

40000696.English_Text:
Oh, it's well made!
You can do it like this in the future.

40000697.English_Text:
Well, then, would you like to try 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</>?
40000697.Chinese_Text:
现在,你想对金做
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 增强</> 吗?

40000699.English_Text:
Would you like to press and hold the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Armor</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Long</> button?
40000699.Chinese_Text:
你想在我们给你的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>盔甲</>上按
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>并按住</>吗?

40000700.English_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</> can be done by clicking here...
40000700.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 增强</>可以通过点击这里完成...

40000701.English_Text:
You must have 
the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhancement Scroll</> required for <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</>.

40000702.English_Text:
This time, try using the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Order</> that I gave you.
40000702.Chinese_Text:
这次,请尝试使用我给您的
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 订购单</>.

40000704.English_Text:
You can try <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</>.
How about you? Isn't it difficult?
40000704.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 可以试试加强</>. 
 怎么样?是不是很难?

40000705.English_Text:
Haha! You succeeded in <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Enhance</>! 
You have talent?!
40000705.Chinese_Text:
哈哈! </> 强化成功! 
 你有天赋吗?

40000706.English_Text:
You're very dexterous,
and finally, I'll tell you about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Disassembly</>.
40000706.Chinese_Text:
既然你很灵巧,我最后给你讲一下
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>拆装</>.

40000708.English_Text:
Press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Armor</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Hold</> just enhanced <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Let's break it down</>
40000708.Chinese_Text:
让我们尝试通过按下
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>并在我们刚刚加强的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>装甲</>上按住</>来<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>拆卸</>.

40000709.English_Text: It's a waste? Haha! Don't worry.

40000710.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Disassembly</> also allows
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>items</> to be obtained
Please use it actively. .
40000710.Chinese_Text:
也可以通过<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>分解</>获得
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>物品</>,请积极使用.

40000712.English_Text:
How do you feel?
Do you feel any change?
40000712.Chinese_Text:
怎么样? 
 有没有觉得有什么变化?

40000714.English_Text:
You can check the obtained <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Agility</> here
!
40000714.Chinese_Text:
您可以在此处查看 
 获得的功率 </>.

40000715.English_Text:
If you grow <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Agility</> to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Golden </>
, then <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Stage</>
You can raise it!

40000716.Original_Text: 그리고 각 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검결</>은\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>효과</>가 다 다르다냥!\n이걸 한번 눌러보겠냥?
40000716.English_Text:
And each <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swordsword</>
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Effect</> is different!
I'll try this once nah?

40000717.English_Text:
How is it~?
Can you see <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Geomgeol</><textColor=[255:204:102:255]>growth</>?

40000721.English_Text:
Finally,
Click here to turn on/off <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Modesty</>!
40000721.Chinese_Text:
最后,在这里按
可以打开和关闭<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>谦虚</>!

40000722.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>검결</>을 켜면\n공격할 때마다 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>공력옥</>이 소모되는 거 잊지 말라냥!
40000722.English_Text:
If you turn on <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Sword Sword</>,
Don't forget that <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>George Jade</> is consumed every time you attack. Nyan!
40000722.Chinese_Text:
别忘了开启<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>剑公会</>,每次攻击
都会消耗<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>灵玉</>!

40000724.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You have obtained a blank paper</>.
Let's open the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Inventory window</>)

40000727.Chinese_Text: (点击<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>学习</>学习<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>武功</>写在武林书上)

40000731.English_Text: (Let's set the quickslot to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>down</>, and use the registered martial arts as <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Auto</>)
40000731.Chinese_Text: (让我们将快速插槽向下移动到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>并将注册的武器用作<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>自动</>)

40000732.English_Text: (Click here to close the empty window)

40000733.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>를 받을 수 있는\n다른 방법이 있다는\n사실을 알고 계십니까?
40000733.English_Text:
Did you know that there are
other ways
to get <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>missions</>?
40000733.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 你知道有
其他方式来接任务</>吗?

40000734.Original_Text: 여기를 누르면\n소협의 도움이 필요한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들을 볼 수 있습니다.
40000734.English_Text:
Click here to see
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Mission</> that needs the help of the small group.
40000734.Chinese_Text:
点击这里可以看到
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>需要小合作社帮助的任务</>.

40000735.Original_Text: 수행 가능한 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들은\n이곳에 표시가 되는데,\n마침 여기 하나 있군요.
40000735.English_Text:
The available <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>missions</> are
displayed here,
there is one right here.
40000735.Chinese_Text:
可以执行的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>任务</>在
中显示,但这里有一个.

40000736.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>를 선택하면\n해당 임무에 대한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>상세 정보</>를 볼 수 있습니다.
40000736.English_Text:
If you select <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Mission</>,
You can view
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Details</> for that mission. There is.
40000736.Chinese_Text:
如果选择<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>任务</>,则可以查看该任务的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>详细信息</>.

40000737.Original_Text: <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>수락 위치</>로 자동으로\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>이동</>할 수도 있으니\n꼭 활용해 보십시오.
40000737.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>automatically</> 
to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>accepted position</> can be moved, so please use it.
40000737.Chinese_Text:
您也可以自动将
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>移动到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>接受位置</>.

40000738.Original_Text: 나 실은 다른 부탁이\n하나 더 있는데 말이야.\n그 전에 알려줄 게 있어.
40000738.English_Text:
Actually, I have another request
I have one more request.
Before that, I have something to tell you.
40000738.Chinese_Text:
其实我还有一个要求
我还有一个要求.

40000739.Original_Text: 앞으로 나처럼 부탁하는\n사람들이 생기면,\n여기에 표시가 될 거야.
40000739.English_Text:
If there are 
people who ask like me in the future,
it will be marked here.
40000739.Chinese_Text:
如果以后有像我一样提问的
人,
会显示在这里.

40000740.Original_Text: 받을 수 있는 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>들은\n여기 보이게 될 텐데,\n먼저 내 부탁을 봐줄래?
40000740.English_Text:
The available <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>missions</>
will be visible here,
Can you see my request first?
40000740.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 可以领取的任务</>
会在这里显示,
你先看看我的要求好吗?

40000741.Original_Text: 지금의 네가 수행할 만한\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>임무</>인지는 여기를 보고\n잘 참고하도록 해.
40000741.English_Text:
See here to see if it is
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Mission</> that you can do now
Please refer to it carefully.
40000741.Chinese_Text:
请仔细参考
,看看你现在可以执行的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>任务</>是否值得.

40000742.Original_Text: 혹시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비결</>에 대해 아십니까?\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>무공</>을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>강화</>할 수 있는\n물품으로 알려져 있습니다.
40000742.English_Text: Do you know about <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>the secret</>? Known as an item that can be <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>enhanced.</>

40000745.English_Text: Would you like to press and hold <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> long</> this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>no blank</> once here?

40000746.English_Text:
Then you will be able to insert <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>trick</>
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>inject</> like this.
40000746.Chinese_Text:
然后,在这里您可以使用
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 秘密</> <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 注入</>,或<textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 进化</> 用于
 武术.

40000747.Original_Text: 원하는 무공의 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>비결</>을 얻어\n무공을 성장해 나가시길 바랍니다.
40000747.English_Text:
I hope you get the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>secret</> of the martial arts you want
and grow your martial arts.
40000747.Chinese_Text:
我希望你得到你想要的武术的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>秘密</>并成长
武术.

40000748.English_Text: Sorry, do you know the way to <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Labyrinth</>?
40000748.Chinese_Text: 你知道通往小峡谷<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷宫</>的路吗?

40000749.Original_Text: 하핫, 제가 알려 드리겠습니다.\n여기를 눌러 보시면,
40000749.English_Text:
Haha, I'll let you know.
If you click here,
40000749.Chinese_Text:
哈哈,我会告诉你的.
如果你点击这里,

40000751.Original_Text: 자, 여기가 그 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>미궁</>입니다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>축지</>로 바로 이동 가능하니,\n편하게 이용해 보십시오.
40000751.English_Text:
Now, this is the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Labyrinth</>.
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>You can go directly to the Teleport</>, 
Please use it comfortably.
40000751.Chinese_Text:
现在是<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>迷宫</>,可以直接移动到
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>中地</>,请放心使用
.

40000752.English_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Clothes</> received as a cheering gift!
Let's open <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Your belongings</>)
40000752.Chinese_Text:
(<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>我们收到了服装</>作为支持礼物!让我们打开
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>财物</>)

40000753.English_Text:
(Here! Here is the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Clothes</> received as a gift)
40000753.Chinese_Text:
(这里!这是我作为礼物收到的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>服装</>)

40000756.English_Text:
(Um... I like this one!
Let's open it soon)
40000756.Chinese_Text:
(嗯……我喜欢这个!
现在打开它)

40000757.English_Text:
(Would you like to try on the outfit you just picked
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Closet</>?)
40000757.Chinese_Text:
(要不要试穿一下在
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>衣橱</>里挑选的衣服?)

40000761.Original_Text: 어때? 잘 이해됐지?\n그렇다면 여기를 눌러서\n내 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>부탁</>을 좀 들어줄래?
40000761.English_Text:
How do you understand?
Then click here
Can you listen to my <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Please</>?
40000761.Chinese_Text:
如何?你明白了吗?
如果是这样,你想通过点击这里听到
我的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>要求</>吗?

40000762.English_Text:
Would you like to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>wear</>on the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equipment</> you just got?
First, <textColor=[255]:204:102:255]>Opening your belongings</>)

40000763.Chinese_Text: (让我们通过按<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>设备两次</>装备它)

40000764.English_Text:
Would you like to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>wear</>on the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equipment</> you just got?
First, <textColor=[255]:204:102:255]>Opening your belongings</>)

40000765.Chinese_Text: (让我们通过按<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>设备两次</>安装它)

40000766.Chinese_Text:
(你想通过点击这里做
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Teleport</>吗?)

40000771.English_Text:
(I can make martial arts <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>evolve</>.
Let's try)
40000771.Chinese_Text:
(我可以<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>进化</>武功.
来试试吧)

40000774.English_Text:
(Now the match really starts!
You should prepare <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Youngshindan</>?
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Your belongings</> let's open it)
40000774.Chinese_Text:
(现在真的是比赛开始了!
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> Youngsindan </> 我们要不要准备好?
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 我们打开随身物品</>)

40000778.Chinese_Text: (啊!你有没有早点得到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>巴尔巴里之魂</>?)

40000779.English_Text:
(Before going down
Do you want to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>weapon</> to <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>equip</>?
Click here )
40000779.Chinese_Text:
(下山前要不要在
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>武器</>上尝试<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>装备</>?
点击这里)

40000784.Original_Text: 참! 새로운 사냥터에 왔으니,\n이 지역을 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>탐사</>해 보는 건 어때?\n여기를 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>눌러</> 시작해봐.
40000784.English_Text:
Oh! I'm on a new hunting ground.
Why don't you <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>exploring</>this area?
Here <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Press</> to start.
40000784.Chinese_Text:
真的!既然来到了新的狩猎场,那么
 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]> 探索一下这个区域怎么样?

40000785.English_Text:
If you perform <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>exploration</>,
you can also receive <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>reward</> like this!
How ? One stone, two pieces?
40000785.Chinese_Text:
进行<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>探索</>,还可以这样获得<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>奖励</>!
怎么样?一块石头还是两块石头?

40000786.Original_Text: 저기 저 녀석들은\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>새총</>을 들고 있는 것 같은데?\n한 번 살펴봐.
40000786.English_Text:
I think those guys over there are carrying
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>slingshot</>?
Take a look.
40000786.Chinese_Text:
我觉得那边的那些人拿着
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>弹弓</>?
看一看.

40000787.English_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Reward</> is a must,
Don't forget it from now on!
40000787.Chinese_Text:
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>补偿</>是必须的,
从现在开始不要忘记!

40000788.Original_Text: 좋아, 이 정도로 마무리하자.\n다시 <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여정</>을 시작해 볼까?
40000788.English_Text:
Okay, let's wrap this up.
Shall we start the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Journey</> again?
40000788.Chinese_Text:
好了,到此为止吧.再从
开始<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>旅程</>?

40000790.English_Text:
Click here
Can you listen to my <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Please</>?
40000790.Chinese_Text:
点击这里同意
我的<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>请求</>?

40000791.English_Text:
Press <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Accept</>
You can proceed with the mission!
40000791.Chinese_Text:
